data.comment: The referee blows his whistle to start the first-half. Huddersfield with the kick-off.
Kieffer Moore scores to make it 1-0 at Cardiff City Stadium.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at Cardiff City Stadium.
It's Cardiff with the kick-off after the break.
The away team have replaced Matty Daly with Isaac Mbenza. This is the first substitution made today by Carlos Corberan.
In the minute 62, Junior Hoilett is replacing Mark Harris for Cardiff at Cardiff City Stadium.
Carlos Corberan is making the team's second substitution at Cardiff City Stadium with Fraizer Campbell replacing Jonathan Hogg.
Great finish from Kieffer Moore to give Cardiff a 2-0 lead.
In the minute 72, Carlos Corberan (Huddersfield) is making a third substitution, with Jaden Brown replacing Harry Toffolo.
The away team replace Christopher Schindler with Rarmani Edmonds-Green.
Marlon Pack is on a sub for Joe Ralls for Cardiff.
In the minute 80, Cardiff make their third substitution with Robert Glatzel replacing Kieffer Moore.
Carlos Corberan is making the team's fifth substitution at Cardiff City Stadium with Adama Diakhaby replacing Demeaco Duhaney.
Robert Glatzel puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 3-0.
In the minute 89, Gavin Whyte is replacing Sheyi Ojo for Cardiff at Cardiff City Stadium.
Josh Murphy is replacing Harry Wilson for the home team.
The match is over. Final score 3-0.
